byline.contributor: Noah Gilbert contributed reporting from Beverly Hills, Calif.

lead_paragraph: “Being an algorithm believer, I thought I should just trust it, and that maybe she was truly, and literally, the one for me,” the groom said.
snippet: “Being an algorithm believer, I thought I should just trust it, and that maybe she was truly, and literally, the one for me,” the groom said....

headline.main: Against All Odds, One Match Was All He Needed
headline.print_headline: Against All Odds, One Match Was All He Needed
